# Button Component

### Button

**Exports:**
- `Button` - Button component

**Props:**
- `shape`: 'circle' | 'square' | undefined
- `size`: 'tiny' | 'small' | 'medium' | 'large' (default: 'medium')
- `variant`: 'primary' | 'secondary' | 'tertiary' | 'error' | 'warning' (default: 'primary')
- `iconPrefix`: Component | undefined - Icon component to show before text
- `iconSuffix`: Component | undefined - Icon component to show after text
- `rounded-sm`: boolean (default: false) - Fully rounded button
- `loading`: boolean (default: false) - Shows loading spinner
- `disabled`: boolean (default: false)
- `buttonElement`: HTMLButtonElement - Bindable reference to button element
- `onclick`: (evt: Event) => void - Click handler
- `class`: string - Additional CSS classes
- Extends `HTMLButtonAttributes`

**Usage:**
```svelte
<script lang="ts">
	import { Button } from 'kampsy-ui';
</script>

<div class="w-full flex flex-wrap gap-4 justify-between">
	<Button size="tiny" aria-label="tiny">upload</Button>
	<Button size="small" aria-label="small">upload</Button>
	<Button aria-label="medium">upload</Button>
	<Button size="large" aria-label="large">upload</Button>
</div>
```

## Installation

```bash
pnpm i -D kampsy-ui@latest
```

## Documentation

Visit http://ui.kampsy.xyz/button for full documentation and examples.
